mapper.insert:
insert into tpds_merchant_account
merchant_no,
login_name,
system_no,
acc_no,
cert_no,
bank_card,
bank_card_branch,
bank_account,
bank_account_branch,
create_time,
update_time,
update_user,
status,
#{merchantNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{systemNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{accNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{certNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{bankCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{bankCardBranch,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{bankAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{bankAccountBranch,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.select: select merchant_no, login_name, system_no, acc_no, cert_no, bank_card, bank_card_branch, bank_account, bank_account_branch, create_time, update_time, update_user, status from tpds_merchant_account where status='ENABLE'
mapper.update:
update tpds_merchant_account
merchant_no = #{merchantNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
login_name = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
system_no = #{systemNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
acc_no = #{accNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cert_no = #{certNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bank_card = #{bankCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bank_card_branch = #{bankCardBranch,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bank_account = #{bankAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bank_account_branch = #{bankAccountBranch,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where tpds_merchant_id = #{tpdsMerchantId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id,merchant_no,login_name,system_no,acc_no,bank_card,bank_card_branch,create_time,update_time,update_user,status from tpds_merchant_account where merchant_no=#{MerchantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and status='ENABLE'

select merchant_no,login_name,system_no,acc_no,bank_card,bank_card_branch,create_time,update_time,update_user,status from tpds_merchant_account where system_no=#{systemNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and status='ENABLE'

select id,merchant_no,login_name,system_no,acc_no,bank_card,bank_card_branch,create_time,update_time,update_user,status from tpds_merchant_account where bank_card_branch=#{bankCardBranch,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and status='ENABLE'

select merchant_no,login_name,system_no,acc_no,bank_card,bank_card_branch,create_time,update_time,update_user,status from tpds_merchant_account where status=#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and system_no=#{systemNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
